name: Fondant au Chocolat
author: Yoly
summary: These chocolaty, fudgy mini cakes are the French version of chocolate molten cakes. Make sure you serve them with a cold glass of milk or a hot cup of java.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine chocolate chips and butter in a microwave-safe bowl
Stir and microwave at 15-second intervals until almost melted
Remove from the microwave and stir until chocolate is completely melted and thoroughly combined
Combine sugar, egg, vanilla extract, and salt in a separate bowl
Pour into chocolate mixture and whisk until combined
Divide batter evenly between both ramekins
Bake in the preheated oven until set, 12 to 14 minutes
Cool on a wire rack for 10 minutes before inverting onto a serving plate
